role: Software Engineer | Project Manager | Event Planner
summary: Versatile full stack Software Engineer with a penchant for producing user-friendly solutions. Complimentary skills include Business Management, Marketing, Content Management/Strategy, and Data Analytics.

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin - Center for Professional Education
education.description: Intensive program that covered  Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js ReactJS.

education.institution: The University of Texas at Austin - Red McCombs School of Business
education.degree: BBA, Business Management with concentration in Entrepreneurship

contribution: Curating online presence for small businesses around Austin, TX via creating main homepages, online menus, and social media accounts.
Managing all marketing efforts, including events, mass email, social media, and website updates.
Cultivating relationships with consultants, vendors, and contractors to optimize marketing campaigns.
Planned, organized, and executed event logistics from initial stages of development, through on-site and event wrap-up.
Acted as liaison between Sales Manager and Event Manager in the process.
Created a bespoke Kanban board to track all active events which generated a 200% increase in sales and booking rates.
Researched, developed, and planned marketing strategies to find seed money, attract investors, and mentors and build brand attraction.
Performed operational and analytical duties including assembling and summarizing data; generating reports and creating marketing strategies from them.
Won several startup competitions, collecting several awards and prizes (totaling $10,000).

projects.name: Interactive Online Menu - Sushi Junai
projects.title: Full Stack Developer, Product Owner
projects.keywords: Was the front-end developer and owner of this project - handling the development and maintence to accomplish the following objectives:
description: Currently in use by the establishment with 4000+ unique visitors and counting.
Dynamic order tracker that displays current and past orders, total cost and calculates the tip.
A timer that displays remaining all-you-can-eat dining time.
projects.tools: React.js, Redux, Yelp API, Reactstrap, Netlify

projects.name: Full Stack Interactive Menu
projects.title: Full Stack Developer, Project Manager
projects.summary: Was the full stack developer of this project, owning it from start to finish - handling the design, implementation, and development of both the front and back end to accomplish the following objectives:
description: User registration, login, and favorite item saving functionality.
Created a dynamic order tracker that displays current orders, costs and calculates the tip.
A timer that displays remaining all-you-can-eat dining time.
projects.tools: React.js, Redux, Yelp API, Reactstrap, Node.js (express/passport/Sequelize), MySQL, Heroku

projects.name: EarBud
projects.title: Full Stack Developer, Project Manager
projects.keywords: This Spotify integrated music reviewing, curating, and cataloging platform allows users to enjoy the same experience they are used to on sites like Rotten Tomatoes. In collaboration with a small team I was able to achieve the following by re-structuring boilerplate code, using AJAX for the front-end, and crud for the back-end:
description: Search, catalog, and review music on an individual page to curate an individual tastes profile.
Trend analysis and presentation of this data in real-time.
projects.tools: jQuery, Foundation, Node.js (express/passport/Sequelize), MySQL, Spotify API, Heroku

projects.name: The Hunger Game
projects.title: Front End Developer, Project Manager
projects.keywords: This Edamam database integrated mobile-friendly diet recipe generator allows users to generate random recipes based on dietary preferences. With a small team, I was the lead developer of this project, owning it from start to finish - handling the design, implementation, and development to accomplish the following objectives:
description: A shopping cart that allows users to add ingredients to refer to later on.
A map where users can search for the nearest grocery store.
projects.tools: jQuery, Materialize, MapBox API, Edamam API, Github Pages
